main_menu_screen:search_icon.name: main_menu_screen:search_icon
main_menu_screen:search_icon.description: A button in the top toolbar used to initiate a search action.

main_menu_screen:search_input.name: main_menu_screen:search_input
main_menu_screen:search_input.description: An input field in the top toolbar for entering search queries.

main_menu_screen:sort_button.name: main_menu_screen:sort_button
main_menu_screen:sort_button.description: A button in the top toolbar used to sort the displayed items.
main_menu_screen:sort_button.effect: tap to navigate to the sorting_dialog_screen, which displays a dialog with sorting options including Title, Artist Name, and Year, and sorting order options including Ascending and Descending. The dialog contains a title at the top, a scrollable view with radio buttons for sorting criteria and order, and buttons for confirming or canceling the selection.

main_menu_screen:equalizer_button.name: main_menu_screen:equalizer_button
main_menu_screen:equalizer_button.description: A button in the top toolbar used to access the equalizer settings.
main_menu_screen:equalizer_button.effect: tap to navigate to the equalizer_settings_screen, which displays equalizer settings including decibel levels, frequency bands with seek bars, and a preset button.

main_menu_screen:more_options_button.name: main_menu_screen:more_options_button
main_menu_screen:more_options_button.description: A button in the top toolbar that opens a menu with additional options.
main_menu_screen:more_options_button.effect: tap to navigate to the more_options_popup_screen, which displays a popup window containing options including creating a new playlist, creating a new playlist from a folder, importing a playlist, setting a sleep timer, accessing settings, and viewing information about the application.

main_menu_screen:albums_list.name: main_menu_screen:albums_list
main_menu_screen:albums_list.description: A list of album frames presented as a Recycler View. Each album frame includes the album image, title, and track count.
main_menu_screen:albums_list.effect: tap to navigate to the albums_tracks_screen, which displays a list of tracks within a selected album. It contains a toolbar with a back button and a title. Below the toolbar, there is a list of tracks with track images, titles, and durations. Each track is represented by an image, a title button, and a duration button.

main_menu_screen:album_frame.name: main_menu_screen:album_frame
main_menu_screen:album_frame.description: A frame containing album details including album_image, album_title, and album_tracks. It is a child of the main_menu_screen:albums_list element.

main_menu_screen:album_image.name: main_menu_screen:album_image
main_menu_screen:album_image.description: The album image presented within an album frame. It is a child of the main_menu_screen:album_frame element.

main_menu_screen:album_title.name: main_menu_screen:album_title
main_menu_screen:album_title.description: The album title presented within an album frame. It is a child of the main_menu_screen:album_frame element.

main_menu_screen:album_tracks.name: main_menu_screen:album_tracks
main_menu_screen:album_tracks.description: The album track count presented within an album frame. It is a child of the main_menu_screen:album_frame element.

main_menu_screen:tab_bar.name: main_menu_screen:tab_bar
main_menu_screen:tab_bar.description: A horizontal tab bar at the bottom of the screen with tabs for Playlists, Folders, Artists, Albums, and Tracks.
main_menu_screen:tab_bar.effect: tap to navigate to the folders_fragment_screen, which displays a main menu with a top toolbar containing a search icon, a search input field, and buttons for sorting, equalizer, and more options. Below the toolbar, there is a nested scroll view containing a list of folders with folder titles and track counts. At the bottom, there is a horizontal tab bar with tabs for Playlists, Folders (selected), Artists, Albums, and Tracks.

main_menu_screen.skeleton:
<framelayout>
 <linearlayout>
  <framelayout>
   <framelayout resource_id="action_bar_root">
    <framelayout resource_id="content">
     <viewgroup resource_id="main_coordinator">
      <linearlayout resource_id="main_menu">
       <linearlayout resource_id="top_app_bar_layout">
        <relativelayout resource_id="top_toolbar_holder">
         <imageview resource_id="top_toolbar_search_icon">
         </imageview>
         <input resource_id="top_toolbar_search"/>
         <viewgroup resource_id="top_toolbar">
          <linearlayoutcompat>
           <button resource_id="sort">
           </button>
           <button resource_id="equalizer">
           </button>
           <button>
           </button>
          </linearlayoutcompat>
         </viewgroup>
        </relativelayout>
       </linearlayout>
      </linearlayout>
      <relativelayout resource_id="main_nested_scrollview">
       <viewgroup resource_id="main_holder">
        <scrollbar resource_id="view_pager">
         <relativelayout resource_id="albums_fragment_holder">
          <relativelayout resource_id="albums_fastscroller">
           <recyclerview resource_id="albums_list">
            <framelayout resource_id="album_frame">
             <viewgroup resource_id="album_holder">
              <imageview resource_id="album_image">
              </imageview>
              <button resource_id="album_title">
              </button>
              <button resource_id="album_tracks">
              </button>
             </viewgroup>
            </framelayout>
           </recyclerview>
           <linearlayout resource_id="trackView">
           </linearlayout>
          </relativelayout>
         </relativelayout>
        </scrollbar>
        <horizontalscrollview resource_id="main_tabs_holder">
         <linearlayout>
          <linearlayout>
           <linearlayout resource_id="tab_item_holder">
            <imageview resource_id="tab_item_icon">
            </imageview>
            <button resource_id="tab_item_label">
            </button>
           </linearlayout>
          </linearlayout>
         </linearlayout>
        </horizontalscrollview>
       </viewgroup>
      </relativelayout>
     </viewgroup>
    </framelayout>
   </framelayout>
  </framelayout>
 </linearlayout>
</framelayout>

more_options_popup_screen:options_list.name: more_options_popup_screen:options_list
more_options_popup_screen:options_list.description: A list of options presented as buttons within a ListView. The options include creating a new playlist, creating a new playlist from a folder, importing a playlist, setting a sleep timer, accessing settings, and viewing information about the application.
more_options_popup_screen:options_list.effect: tap to navigate to the settings_screen, which displays settings options with a toolbar containing a back button and a title. Below the toolbar, there is a scrollable view with various settings options. These options include sections for color customization, general settings, and audio settings. The color customization section contains buttons for customizing colors and widget colors. The general settings section includes buttons for managing excluded folders, managing shown tabs, swapping previous/next headphone buttons, and showing filenames as song titles. The audio settings section includes a checkbox for gapless playback.

Below the toolbar, there is a nested scroll view containing a list of albums with album images, titles, and track counts.
